attributes.action: seek to ensure that road pricing or congestion charging on any section of UK road at any time is set at a level only just sufficient to ensure an adequate traffic flow, not to empty the roads to any extent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The purpose of road pricing should be to reduce congestion, not to raise Government revenue.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps several already in existence -  
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/Nomoretax/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
